Welcome to the R users meetup group at Dedan Kimathi University of Technology! We are an R User group based in Dedan Kimathi University Of Technology in Nyeri, Kenya.
We share knowledge about doing data science and machine learning with R through our weekly meetups every thuRsday where we learn, grow, and network together on everything Rstats.

## Achievements
1. Winner Zindi Financial Inclusion Hackathon 2021
2. Winner Data Science and Artificial Intelligence Club (DSAIC) Hack 2023
3. R User Groups Grant | from R Consortium
Year 2023
4. R User Groups Grant |from R Consortium
Year 2024
